评论详情: Great fit, exactly as described.  Material is so soft.  Buying other colors

Casual, but so cute and classy! You can wear them just to run your errands or to a casual lunch or brunch. I have them in 4 colors. Runs true to size. I wear them with leggings or tight jeans. Very-very cute!
It is labeled as oversized, I sized up and it’s still not a big bulky sweater to wear with leggings like the picture shows or like it is described.
It's a beautiful color, but there is no "shape" to it.  It's a bit boxy.

I needed a sweater that could arrive within a day or two for an outdoor event, and this was perfect. I honestly bought it based on the great reviews, and they were all very helpful. It comes in a variety of colors and I chose blue since most of my sweaters are black or brown. It is super soft and the quality is better than I imagined. I ordered a small and it was the perfect fit. It wasn’t too tight and I still had a little bit of room. Living in Florida, I don’t have a need for sweaters that often, but I will definitely buy another one of these in a different color. It is a little bit off the shoulder, so you could even wear it over a mock turtleneck or a tank top. Definitely one of my best purchases so far in 2025.

This sweater is beautiful and I love the color! I sized up to a large so it would give it an oversize fit and it sits on the shoulder perfectly.  Just for reference I am 5’2 and 150 lbs.  but it you won’t regret it!

Not satisfied with the quality or style. I had to return.
I had high hopes for this sweater…I’ve only worn it a couple of times and hadn’t even washed it yet, and the sweater ripped right down the shoulder seam. Totally unwearable. Buyer beware.
Sweater is beautiful. Nice fit.
Comfortable & perfect sweater for the office or date night. Color is as shown with slight golden flecks to dress it up.

This is such a cozy winter sweater. Bought last year. Bought again this year but ended up returning as the color did not look good on me. Will buy again in another color. Live in FL so we just do not get a ton of cold days. It is super cute though with jeans or leggings. Love the wider neck.

I wasn’t looking for a true off the shoulder sweater so it’s fine.  Very warm, soft and cozy.  I will be ordering another one.

I paired it with grey high waisted straight jeans, but leggings or a cute mini skirt would work too! I gifted 1 of the 3 to my sister in-law and she loved it just the same!!
This sweater is so pretty. It is soft and comfortable. It's true to size.

评论概述: Order UP for the look on the model!!
评论详情: I’m 5’7, 108 and a true small in sweaters and shirts, so I went with my usual. This is tiny, it’s definitely not oversized, the sleeves are really short and just barely hit the top of my wrist, and it definitely doesn’t have that slouchy, off the shoulder look shown here. You’d need to size up probably 2 sizes to get the look it’s showing here, BUT beware that with a bigger size, the neck might not be “off the shoulder”, it might just be too large and low, and the sweater might not be slouchy oversized, it might just be fitted but longer. Also, the color is okay, it’s hard to see in pics but it’s not a pretty brown, so I’d try a different color. It’s not super soft, definitely needs a shirt underneath because the stitching is pretty loose, but it’s not scratchy. If you really want this sweater, size up and see how you like it, but I’ve purchased others for cheaper that generally just fit better all around, so this is a return for me.

It’s beautiful and really made well. It’s thick and soft. I ordered a medium for my 14 yr old granddaughter, however I should’ve ordered a large.  It fits me; I’m 5’5” 108lbs. And she’s about 5’7” and is 135lbs. We both have long arms and it’s long enough I hope for her.

Well made bought for my niece

评论概述: So cute with lace Bottom skirt
评论详情: I recently purchased the BTFBM Women Casual Long Sleeve Fall Sweater, and I am absolutely in love with it! This sweater has quickly become a staple in my autumn wardrobe, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The crew neck design is both classic and versatile, making it easy to pair with various outfits. Whether I’m dressing it up with a skirt or keeping it casual with jeans, this sweater fits seamlessly into any look. The solid color options are also fantastic, allowing for easy mixing and matching with other pieces in my closet. One of the highlights of this sweater is how incredibly soft and comfortable it feels against the skin. The ribbed knitted fabric provides just the right amount of stretch, making it cozy without feeling restrictive. It’s perfect for those cooler fall days when you want to stay warm but still look stylish. The length of the sweater is ideal, hitting at just the right spot to be flattering without being too short. I also appreciate the long sleeves, which offer extra warmth and a chic touch. It’s lightweight enough to layer under a jacket but warm enough to wear on its own.
I wore this sweater for Thanksgiving. It falls perfectly off the shoulder and is super comfy. I bought the white which is more of a oatmeal type color but I like it!

This sweater is exactly what I was looking for! It's incredibly soft and feels amazing against the skin. The fit is just right—not too tight, not too loose, but still gives that oversized look that I was going for. I'm 5'3", 120 lbs, 32DD, with an average build, and a small fits perfectly. It has that effortlessly chic off-the-shoulder look that I love.  I've already purchased it in two colors and am planning to get more soon. Bonus: It washes beautifully without losing its softness or shape, which is always a win! Highly recommend this sweater if you're looking for something cozy, flattering, and versatile.
Was skeptical about buying the sweater online, however, very cute. Gotten a lot of compliments. Sleeves are long enough. Love the color and fit. Material is good as well.

For reference, I am 5'6 and 170 lbs and I am wearing a lg. I am built (muscular) and this sweater is one of my favorites to wear. It can be dressed up or down, has a relaxed fit, which is why I mentioned I'm muscular,  others fit tight around my shoulders/back even though they claim to be loose, but this one is very flattering and so comfortable
I really like this sweater but i can’t exchange it for a smaller size. If I return the large and then purchase a medium, I won’t get the sale price.

This sweater exceeded my expectations.  I am usually a small top (34 DD, small frame), but I was looking for a slouchier look, so I ordered the medium.  It fits really well, and it held up in the laundry in a garment bag/dry flat.
Such a versatile sweater! Easily dress up or down!
Material wasn’t as soft as expected. I ordered a large because I prefer the oversized look. The fit was a little short on me, but also too wide.  I am 5’6, 140lbs.
I purchased a large based on the reviews to size up. Wish I had not. It’s definitely a size too big. Should have stuck with a medium. Cute hot pink sweater that I will be giving away.

I bought a small, fits great, a little oversized. I ended up buying it in another color too. Is not an off the shoulder for me, which is perfect. If you want it to truly fall down the shoulder, you may want to size up.

I really like this sweater. Bought it to wear off the shoulder with leggings. Nice color and high quality. I just wish I sized up for more of an oversized fit but will probably keep it and order the next size in another color.

Super impressed with the quality and softness of this sweater. I am wearing a size small (I’m 5’10 - 145lbs if that matters) and it fits great in the arms as far as length and looseness. Perfect weight where it keeps you warm but won’t get too hot in! Love it! Insta: Jordycoul for styling ideas for it
I love the off the shoulder style. It’s soft and cozy with a fun flair.
It was an ok fit not like the picture unless you buy a couple sizes too big
Color is correct but looks nothing like the pictures the ends also curl up after washing.

This has come to be a top ten favorite sweater to wear. It's very comfortable and soft. Does not feel heavy or get too hot when indoors.  The bonus feature I like is the off the shoulder look. It does not make my sleeves feel uneven when it goes off the shoulder.
Not as off the shoulder as the picture implies. I wish I would have given it a second look before taking the tags off as I will never wear it and should have returned it.

This sweater is absolutely gorgeous! What you see is what you receive. I dislike shopping for clothing. I really do… especially online. I tried this on… not I want to throw away all my clothes and start over…it’s that beautiful. Trust me… I never write reviews…they deserve 10 stars!

Loving this oversized sweater to keep me warm this winter! The fabric is thick, soft and cozy! Did have an odd seam in the back of the neckline, near my left shoulder blade. I would recommend hang drying after washing, the fabric seems like it might pill up. All in all a Great addition to your winter wardrobe! BUY IT! 评论概述: I am 5’3” , 140 lbs, bought a large
评论详情: So I bought a large because the other reviewers warned to buy a size up. They were correct! If you want the loose chunky comfort look, definitely buy up. A very soft material that feels high quality. Not scratchy at all. Great color, true to the photo! Nice deep green. Have yet to see how a wash goes…may update later!

评论概述: Gorgeous oversized off the shoulder sweater
评论详情: It is so helpful for me to read reviews when I'm looking for the right size.  I am a slender upper body build, 5'6 135lbs and the small was perfect for the same look as the model.  I often get a size medium if I want something to be oversized, but this is already there.  Just buy your true size and you should be fine.  It's a bit long so I tucked it into the back of my jeans, but otherwise it is perfect.  My new fall favorite for sure, I may even buy more!
This sweater is very warm and comfortable. If you want the neck to fall off your shoulder I would order a size up.
So soft and comfy. I think it can be dressed up or down... So happy I bought it. I wear a small and it's loose without being sloppy or swimming in the boxy shape

I bought this sweater on sale in a size L, color Apricot. For reference, I’m 5’8” 170 lbs, 36B, curvy through hips.  I normally wear a M or L in tops. The L covers my bottom in the back. I tucked the front into my yoga pants as soon as I received the sweater. Hangs off the shoulder as described. However, I’m more of a pear shaped girlie so my shoulder width is a little smaller than my hip width. If you have wider shoulders and/or a wider bust,  the top may or may not slide off the shoulder. Overall, it’s comfortable and cute. The material is a little heavy but soft. Very casual look. Could be paired with a nice belt and some necklaces and a bracelet to dress it up. I left off one star because I felt that, even with the sales price, the sweater could’ve been a little bit more of a higher quality fabric. If I wanted a more snug/body hugging fit, I would order a medium.
Cheaply made, didn’t hold up, stretched out of shape, poor purchase

This is a very warm cozy sweater but it doesn't look anything like the photo. It's not off the shoulder, not very oversized. Unless you're a very slim person it isn't going to look like that.  Definitely not long enough for leggings, sits right at the hips. I'm keeping it because it's good for work but definitely not what it seemed like in the photo.

I did order a few different colors in this. It does fit true to size. And they do wash up very nice. I did not dry mine. I laid mine flat, but I will be ordering a few more colors because I do like the way they fit.
Right out of package hole. Smh. Quality lacking. Not even close to picture. RETURN. Obviously!!! I ordered 3 diff colors. I’m already regretting.

评论概述: This is my THIRD color of this sweater!
评论详情: I have the Dark Green, Orange and now this Blue of this sweater. I LOVE it. Perfectly oversized, softer than you'd think, warm to get you through the true winter months... it looks dressy enough for the office or a night out but can also be dressed down... don't hesitate on this one!

My review is for three colors in a size small: dark coffee, apricot, and white.  I’m 5’3, 135 lbs, 36b cup and I normally wear small. In my opinion, you don’t need to size up. I almost went to a medium and I’m here to say I’m glad I stayed with my normal size-it’s still very baggy for a small if that’s what you are looking for. I was VERY happy with coffee and white colors- both were perfection. Apricot model photos show a cool toned fiber that looks speckled and in person I felt it was more like an unspeckled beige. It just looked cheap to me. They should redo those photos it’s misleading. In person it’s more like a flat one color light warm toned beige. But! I found that the white color IS actually what I was looking for when I purchased apricot….so if you like the apricot photos try the white product instead lol! I can wear a pink, green, blue, or taupe leggings and the white looks good with all so it’s very versatile. I don’t feel like I have to constantly adjust the neckline to keep it off the shoulder, even with arm movements it seems to stay put off the shoulder and I like that. The bottom of the sweater has a little “rolled up” accent which is cute. Overall it has a lot of give and stretch so you can play with how you want it to look.
Not what I expected but it is very beautiful
This sweater is extremely soft, cozy and the blue color is absolutely amazing. But for an oversized cozy look with leggings or skinny jeans, definitely size up.

I am very happy with this sweater, very soft. If you want it to look like it does on the model - SIZE UP - big time. I am usually a size small, maybe a medium, I bought this in XL and it is not too big. I read reviews and went with a big size because I wanted it to be slouchy and off the shoulder. The XL fits me in a way that looks like the pictures. I am 5'2" 130lbs, athletic build.

Arrived damaged! Threads hanging out right in the middle of shoulder area, big one too. For this price I would expect damn good quality but no. Worst purchase I've made on Amazon. Save your money but anything but this shirt
It's soft and flattering. Love the neckline. It isn't too tight or loose. Hangs nicely. This is the perfect sweater.
